verbose_text: In conclusion, our results suggest that prednisone contained serum may induce the lymphocytes from female rats ' spleens differentiation into Treg cells as well as inhibit them differentiation into Th17 cells, accompanied by a reduction of IL-17 secretion and an increment of IL-10 secretion.
evidence: prednisone-contained serum may induce the lymphocytes from female rats' spleens differentiation into Treg cells as well as inhibit them differentiation
